solution_line_template: First find the total number of times the wombats claw him: {num_wombats} wombats * {wombat_claws_per} claws/wombat = <<{num_wombats}*{wombat_claws_per}={wombat_claws}>>{wombat_claws} claws
Then add the number of times the rheas claw him to find the total: {wombat_claws} claws + {num_rheas} claws = <<{wombat_claws}+{num_rheas}={total_claws}>>{total_claws} claws
